content:

Looks like we missed an important celebration!
I was so distracted by the fireworks yesterday, but now I can finally say—

Hehehe~ha! I'm sharing some birthday joy with the birthday star!
I guess this counts as a way to celebrate too~

Happy birthday to you!

Happy Birthday!
